title: Short Talk and Guided Meditation: Bringing RAIN to Fear
itunes:title: Short Talk and Guided Meditation: Bringing RAIN to Fear
description: Short Talk and Guided Meditation: Bringing RAIN to Fear (2020-03-18) - In this practice we explore how the mindfulness and compassion of RAIN can free us from the grip of fear. This is an excerpt from the full talk: Facing Pandemic Fears with an Awake Heart. Video available via tarabrach.com and Tara’s YouTube channel.
